amendment.description: Amendment increases School Improvement Programs funding by $2 million for Women's Educational Equity Act programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $2,000,000 from the Education Research, Statistics, and Improvement account into the Women's Educational Equity account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowey amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 294 - 129 (Roll no. 304).
